original: Åström, Johan Göran, assessor, v. auditör, Norrköping, i. 23/10/09’ i Uppsala av krigsdom. John A. o. Brita Kugelberg. G. 40 m. Margit Verner. Barn: Jonas f. 45, Anders 46. — Stud :-ex. i Upps. 28, jur. kand. 33. Tings-tjg. i Bråbygdens o. Finspånga 1. doms. 33-36, tjg. i Göta hovr. fr. 36, fiskal 37, v. assess. v. rådh:rätten i Norrköp. 39 o. -fr. 40, assess. där 47, v. auditör v. Bråvalla flygflottilj fr. 45.
translated: Åström, Johan Göran, assessing officer, vice auditor, Norrköping, born on 23/10/09 in Uppsala, of military descent. Son of John A. and Brita Kugelberg. Married in 1940 to Margit Verner. Children: Jonas born in 1945, Anders in 1946. Graduated from Uppsala University with a law degree in 1928 and a Juris Doctor in 1933. Served as a court clerk in Bråbygdens and Finspånga District Court from 1933 to 1936, then transferred to Göta Court of Appeal in 1936 as an official, and became a deputy judge in 1937. Vice assessing officer at the municipal court in Norrköping from 1939-1940, and assessing officer from 1947. Also served as vice auditor at Bråvalla Air Wing from 1945.
